how can i find out what the number is for the external hd?  i would guess it would be /dev/sdb1, but i dont know how to find out... under the disk manager, it just has it as /dev/sdb
The first partition on it is sdb1, the second is sdb2 like that. Run "sudo fdisk -l /dev/sdb" to see the numbers
